sentences.sContent: She attributes her success to hard work and a little luck.
sentences.sCn: 她认为她的成功来自勤劳和一点运气。

sentences.sContent: What attributes should a good manager possess?
sentences.sCn: 一名优秀的经理应该具备哪些素质？

sentences.sContent: ...Some simplistically attribute the decline in our public education system to the drain of skilled students by private schools...

remMethod.val: at(表加强) ＋ tribute(给予) → 一再给予 → 把…归因于

trans.tranOther: to believe or say that a situation or event is caused by something
a quality or feature, especially one that is considered to be good or useful
